pageContext.geocode_address: 15301 Wicks Boulevard, San Leandro, CA 94579, USA
pageContext.course_type_long_description: In this full day summer camp, kids experience a half day of LEGO® building with Play-Well TEKnologies to complement a half day of playful exercising with Play-Well Move. Apply real-world concepts in physics, engineering, and architecture through projects such as: gear cars, gondolas, merry-go-rounds, and scissor lifts. Shift gears and learn new skills while working as a team in a variety of activities such as frisbee, kickball, and group communication games. The perfect combination of indoor and outdoor fun!
pageContext.course_type_name: STEM Challenge using LEGO® + Play-Well Move: FULL DAY
